meanings.sent1: She was a bimanous artist, skillfully painting with both hands.
meanings.sent2: The bimanous chef effortlessly chopped vegetables with both hands.
meanings.sent3: The bimanous juggler amazed the audience by juggling with both hands behind his back.
meanings.sent4: Her bimanous skills in calligraphy were unmatched, creating beautiful art with both hands.
meanings.sent5: The bimanous pianist played a mesmerizing melody using both hands on the keys.

meanings.sent3: The bimanous statue in the park had intricate carvings on both hands.
meanings.sent4: The bimanous doll had movable arms that could hold tiny objects.
meanings.sent5: The bimanous alien had a unique feature of having two hands on each arm.
